metadata.name: VoiceSearch Insights
metadata.description: Premium audio search interface with AI-powered summaries

aesthetic_direction.concept: Refined Minimalism meets Audio Interface Design
aesthetic_direction.key_principle: Every element serves the search and audio experience

components.SearchBar: Text input with real-time search, loading state spinner
components.AudioPlayer: Play/pause, progress bar, waveform visualization, duration timer
components.ResultCard: Title, description, domain, snippet, selection state
components.HistoryList: Recent searches with timestamps, delete action
